Class EventDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.DAO

  • public class EventDAO
extends DAO
    Represents an User data access object Methods access User table in database.

      • createEvent

        public java.lang.Boolean createEvent(Event event)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Takes in a Event object with all information and inserts the information into the database. The function returns true if the method succeeded.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the event insert succeeded

        java.sql.SQLException

      • readEvent

        public Event readEvent(java.lang.String eventID)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Takes in a eventID as a string and checks the database for that user which is the primary key. The function returns the User object.
        Parameters:
        eventID - String username
        Returns:
        returns Model Event if user is found in database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteEvent

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Returns a true boolean if the user was deleted
